content.rendered:
Kapitalise

Kapitalise strives to enhance an optimized and efficient procedure for securing Research & Development (R&D) tax credits for clients. The application provides a swift, hassle-free, and expert-guided solution for R&D tax credits

About

Brand: Kapitalise

Location: London, United Kingdom

Industry: Fintech/Consulting

Budget:: $10,000 – $49,000

Clutch Review: 

5.0
 5/5

Product link: kapitalise.co.uk

Type of software: Web App

Scope of work: Back-end, Front-end, Refactoring, Quality Assurance

Kapitalise aims to improve a streamlined and efficient process for claiming Research & Development (R&D) tax credits on behalf of their clients. The goal is to offer a quick, stress-free, and expert-driven R&D tax credit solution.

Technologies

React

Angular

Ruby on Rails Monolith

What our client
wanted

Eneko Igartua

Co-Founder, Kapitalise Ltd

We wanted to simplify and make an efficient solution for R&D tax credit claims. Many businesses want to take advantage of these tax incentives but find the process overwhelming. We plan to gain a competitive advantage in the R&D tax credit consulting industry

Challenge

  • To gain a competitive advantage in the R&D tax credit consulting industry by offering a streamlined and expert-driven service. It was needed to reduce the administrative burden on clients by simplifying the claims process

Key features

  • Data uploads, automatic creation of .xlxs files
  • Custom CSS templating
  • Functionality for direct and indirect qualifying activities for all financial types
  • Xero integration
  • Upgrade Ruby to 3.2 version
  • Upgrade all types of libraries

Project Team

Inna

Project Manager​

Viktor

Fullstack developer

Volodymyr

Fullstack developer

Get a quote

Client’s review

Eneko Igartua

Co-Founder, Kapitalise Ltd

Snotor has helped us improve the customer experience and make our platform better. They always come up with great ideas for app development, which makes their work really valuable

5.0
 5/5

Business Value

We refactored the code, and made the platform better, lighter, with the ability to scale it in the future.

From a business point of view, we have made changes to the platform, making it more understandable and convenient for the target audience

Let's start. It's easier than you think.

Contact us
Next case

excerpt.rendered: Kapitalise is a web application designed to streamline and optimize the process of claiming Research & Development (R&D) tax credits for our clients, guided by experts. Our solution ensures a smooth and efficient pathway to accessing R&D tax credits, minimizing hassle and maximizing efficiency
